attributes.action: Stop financial associations with  Putin and the Russian Federation
attributes.additional_details: Put pressure on Putin  to withdraw  from the Ukraine  by ceasing to have financial  dealings with those  close to him or  members of the  Kremlin and more widely  with the Russian Federation
attributes.background: Scrutinise funding streams, both  shareholding and donations and insist  individuals and organisations including political parties  cease any  financial associations  with individuals and organisations associated with the Kremlin and the Russian Federation.

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to the acceptance of donations to individual political parties are a matter for those parties, not the UK Government or House of Commons. 

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428 

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418 

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
